samples.question: So do young people take their parents advice when choosing a major?
samples.transcript: In my country, there are a lot of young people who, take advice from their parents And I think that is the end of the video. I think that you cannot be able to take the parents when choosing a major as well as let their parents choose their major for them. I do not think this is a good trend. So, I think in the future young people should be more independent and choose their own major. Alright, so I think that is the end of all speaking tests today.

samples.question: Describe a place in your city or town where you like to go to in your free time.
samples.transcript: Well, there is this huge shopping mall right in the western part of my city called, Bombland. I really like there and it has a great number of, stores, of all kinds. I usually go there in my leisure time with my sister and, I enjoy, window shopping there, I do not have a lot of time to do shopping there although there are so many other things to do. so, people can go there to do their shopping, spend time together and just have fun in their leisure time. Wonderful.
samples.transcript_original: Uh, well, there is this huge shopping mall right in the western part of my city called, uh, Bombland. I really like there and it has a great number of, uh, stores, uh, of all kinds. Uh, I usually go there in my leisure time with my sister and, um, I enjoy, uh, window shopping there, I do not have a lot of time to do shopping there although there are so many other things to do. Um, so, uh, people can go there to do their shopping, spend time together and just have fun in their leisure time. Wonderful.
samples.transcript_cleaned: there is this huge shopping mall right in the western part of my city called, Bombland. I really like there and it has a great number of, stores, of all kinds. I usually go there in my leisure time with my sister and, I enjoy, window shopping there, I do not have a lot of time to do shopping there although there are so many other things to do. so, people can go there to do their shopping, spend time together and just have fun in their leisure time. Wonderful.

samples.question: And why do you like to go there in particular?
samples.transcript: I think it is because there are so many different activities that you can do there.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I think it's because there are so many different activities that you can do there.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think it is because there are so many different activities that you can do there.

samples.question: Whatever I need to buy I can find it there.
samples.transcript: Or if I want to get together with my friends, it is a great place for us to hang out for a while. in a, summary, to just, have a conclusion, I can say that it is like a, little city under one roof. it is amazing. Great.
samples.transcript_original: Or if I want to get together with my friends, it's a great place for us to hang out for a while. Um, in a, uh, summary, to just, uh, have a conclusion, I can say that it's like a, um, little city under one roof. It's amazing. Great.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Or if I want to get together with my friends, it is a great place for us to hang out for a while. in a, summary, to just, have a conclusion, I can say that it is like a, little city under one roof. it is amazing.

samples.question: And is there anything you do not like about it?
samples.transcript: Yes, the only thing that I can think of is the parking situation. The parking garage is, so crowded and sometimes I have to spend, a lot of time just driving around to find an empty spot. besides I have just obtained my driving license and so it is kind of annoying and it annoys me even more. So I think that they should have a system to show us where the empty spots are so that we can just go right to the spots without dragging around and around for a long time. Great.
samples.transcript_original: Yes, uh, the only thing that I can think of is the parking situation. So I think that they should have a system to show us where the empty spots are so that we can just go right to the spots without dragging around and around for a long time. Great.

So I think that they should have a system to show us where the empty spots are so that we can just go right to the spots without dragging around and around for a long time.

And let us now move on to talk about the internet.

samples.question: How often do you use the internet?
samples.transcript: To be honest, I am almost always online since my work and my studies both can be undertaken through the internet. Especially since, this coronavirus situation happened, we do not have any other choice than to use the internet. I usually use, internet to, find information both for my work and some personal reasons. So, I am, I can say that I am, using internet several times a day. Wow.

samples.question: May I have the papers back please?

samples.question: And are there any hobbies that you think are not worthwhile?
samples.transcript: To be honest, some hobbies can be a real waste of time for me. for example, collecting baseball cards, is, not, one of my favorites because I am so uninterested in baseball. But, of course, I cannot say that it cannot be worthwhile for, someone who enjoys, baseball and likes this hobby. So I think that having a hobby is fine as long as it is not harmful to yourself and other people. And as long as you are having fun with it, so it is okay and it is worth doing it.
samples.transcript_original: Um, to be honest, some hobbies can be a real waste of time for me. Uh, for example, collecting baseball cards, um, is, um, not, uh, one of my favorites because I'm so uninterested in baseball. But, of course, I cannot say that it can't be worthwhile for, uh, someone who enjoys, uh, baseball and likes this hobby. So I think that having a hobby is fine as long as it's not harmful to yourself and other people. And as long as you're having fun with it, so it's okay and it's worth doing it.
samples.transcript_cleaned: To be honest, some hobbies can be a real waste of time for me. for example, collecting baseball cards, is, not, one of my favorites because I am so uninterested in baseball. But, of course, I cannot say that it cannot be worthwhile for, someone who enjoys, baseball and likes this hobby. So I think that having a hobby is fine as long as it is not harmful to yourself and other people. And as long as you are having fun with it, so it is okay and it is worth doing it.

samples.question: Okay, and why do you think people have hobbies?
samples.transcript: I think people, have different entertainments, in their free time because they want to relax. After a whole week of working or studying, we all need some time to relax and enjoy ourselves. Also, people might have hobbies to learn some new skills like drawing, like knitting, or even learning a new language. And the other thing that I can think of is finding new people and new friends. You can join groups of like-minded people, that have the same hobbies as you do and that can be so great and fun. so I think, these are the reasons why people allocate time to hobbies. Right.
samples.transcript_original: Um, I think people, uh, have different entertainments, uh, in their free time because they want to relax. Also, people might have hobbies to learn some new skills like drawing, like knitting, or even learning a new language. And the other thing that I can think of is finding new people and new friends. You can join groups of like-minded people, uh, that have the same hobbies as you do and that can be so great and fun. Uh, so I think, uh, these are the reasons why people allocate time to hobbies. Right.

Also, people might have hobbies to learn some new skills like drawing, like knitting, or even learning a new language. And the other thing that I can think of is finding new people and new friends. You can join groups of like-minded people, that have the same hobbies as you do and that can be so great and fun. so I think, these are the reasons why people allocate time to hobbies.

samples.question: And how important is it to encourage children to take up hobbies?
samples.transcript: It is great. I think it is so good to motivate, children to, take up hobbies for themselves. that is how, they can, Use their free time instead of just wandering around, watching TV, or just playing with their phones.
